data.comment: Today's referee, Juan Luca Sacchi, has blown to start the match.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 3, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a throw-in for Benevento, close to Hellas Verona's area.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Hellas Verona.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Hellas Verona.
Gaetano Letizia is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Benevento's Gaetano Letizia is back in action after a slight knock.
Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Important block from the Benevento defence as Darko Lazovic fires in a strike for Hellas Verona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Goal! Antonin Barak gives Hellas Verona a 1-0 lead in Verona.
In the minute 17, Great play from Mattia Zaccagni to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Matteo Lovato (Hellas Verona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Hellas Verona.
Benevento needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 24, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Luca Caldirola has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 26, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
Gianluca Lapadula (Benevento) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Benevento drives forward and Gianluca Caprari gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Federico Dimarco (Hellas Verona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 29, Hellas Verona's Antonin Barak has been booked in Verona.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Benevento pushes forward through Gianluca Caprari, whose finish on goal is saved.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 33, Bryan Dabo's header is off-target for Benevento.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Antonin Barak (Hellas Verona) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 34, Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Benevento's half.
Mattia Zaccagni for Hellas Verona drives towards goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 38, Gianluca Caprari of Benevento smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Verona, Roberto Insigne (Benevento) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 40, Hellas Verona's Ivan Ilic misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In the minute 41, Free kick in a good position for Benevento!
Benevento drive upfield and Roberto Insigne gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Benevento attack but Artur Ionita's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 43, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Pasquale Schiattarella (Benevento) has received a first yellow card.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matteo Lovato (Hellas Verona) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Benevento close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Luca Caldirola with Alessandro Tuia. This is the first substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a first substitution, with Pawel Dawidowicz replacing Matteo Lovato.
In the minute 46, Ivan Juric is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi with Giangiacomo Magnani replacing Alan Empereur.
In the minute 47, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Benevento push forward at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi and Gianluca Lapadula gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Hellas Verona defence.
Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
In the minute 54, Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Kamil Glik (Benevento) has received a yellow card from Juan Luca Sacchi.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Gianluca Lapadula.
Gianluca Caprari with an assist there.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Hellas Verona are coming forward and Nikola Kalinic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 59, Hellas Verona's Nikola Kalinic is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Benevento have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Antonin Barak scores to make it 2-1 at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Federico Dimarco instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 65, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Mattia Zaccagni is booked for the home team.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 67, Nikola Kalinic (Hellas Verona) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 68, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Mattia Zaccagni (Hellas Verona) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Benevento are pushing forward but Bryan Dabo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team replace Roberto Insigne with Riccardo Improta.
Artur Ionita for Benevento has been booked by Juan Luca Sacchi and receives a first yellow card.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Gianluca Caprari is shown a red card and sent off.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Benevento.
Andres Tello is replacing Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 75, The away team have replaced Gianluca Lapadula with Gabriele Moncini. This is the fourth substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
Darko Lazovic (Hellas Verona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Goal! Hellas Verona increase their lead to 3-1 through a well-placed header from Darko Lazovic.
That's a fine assist from Federico Dimarco.
In the minute 79, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona drive upfield and Darko Lazovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benevento defender.
In the minute 81, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 83, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giangiacomo Magnani (Hellas Verona) has received a yellow card from Juan Luca Sacchi.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Benevento throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Ivan Juric is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi with Samuel Di Carmine replacing Nikola Kalinic.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Hellas Verona.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 88, Play has been interrupted briefly in Verona to check on Federico Ceccherini, who is grimacing with pain.
Federico Ceccherini returns to the field for Hellas Verona after picking up a slight injury.
Juan Luca Sacchi will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Hellas Verona.
Kamil Glik of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a fourth substitution, with Ebrima Colley replacing Antonin Barak.
Koray Gunter is replacing Federico Ceccherini for the home team.
The match at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alessandro Tuia, who is down injured.
